import {useState} from 'react' import style from "./home.module.scss" import clsx from "clsx" import BtnSlider from "./BtnSlider" export default function Slider() { const slider = [ { name: "leather bag", des: "hand cut and crafted in soft nenuine leather" }, { name: "stripes", des: "mad for summer" }] return (
{slider.map((item, index) => (

{item.des}

{item.name}

explorer shopping now
))}
) }
